meanings: (생각·제도·문물 등이) old, old-fashioned, outdated, outmoded, out-of-date, antiquated, obsolete

vlive.korean: 근데 또 낡은 맛에 사는 게 있잖아요, 약간. - 그렇죠. But that oldness has its own charms. - Yes. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] MAMAMOO X LieV - 마마무의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: But that oldness has its own charms. - Yes.

vlive.korean: 마법이 풀려 예쁜 드레스가 점점 낡은 옷으로 희미하게 변해갔어요. As the enchantment is broken, the dress gradually begame rags. 듣기 View video SF9 : SF9의 보이는 라디오 Sound Fantasy 9 0회차 -청취안내방송편-
vlive.english: As the enchantment is broken, the dress gradually begame rags.

vlive.korean: 끝부분이 조금 낡아있더라고 - 응? The edges were worn out. - What? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [GOT7] 눈 덩어리보다 더 반가운 덩어리들,, 아이러브유💚 (GOT7’s acrostic poem bet)
vlive.english: The edges were worn out. - What?

vlive.korean: 낡았었어? - 네? Was it old? - What? 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 11회 : 마지막 뒷 이야기 편 (The last story)
결국 새것도 다 낡는다. In the end, new things end up getting old. 듣기 View video FANGUIN TV : [Davichi] 강민경 '8/3 생일기념' 스페셜 LIVE
vlive.english: In the end, new things end up getting old.

examples.korean: He wore old jeans and a pair of sneakers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 낡은 청바지에 운동화를 신고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He wore old jeans and a pair of sneakers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She draped a cover over the old sofa. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그 낡은 소파 위에 커버를 씌웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She draped a cover over the old sofa. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: an old house with crumbling plaster and a leaking roof 듣기 Add to Wordbook 회반죽이 부서져 내리고 지붕이 새는 낡은 집 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an old house with crumbling plaster and a leaking roof Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Roses grew in profusion against the old wall. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 낡은 담장에 기대어 장미가 많이[흐드러지게] 자라고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Roses grew in profusion against the old wall. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Old houses are often damp. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 낡은 집들은 흔히 습하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
